translation.en: ...if you feel the heat around the corner."

translation.en: Now, if you're on me, and you gotta move when I move...

translation.en: Well, that's an interesting point.

translation.en: So then, if you spot me coming around that corner...

translation.en: ...and all the victims of all the murders I ever worked are sitting at this table...
translation.th: แล้วเหยื่อของฆาตกรทุกราย ที่ผมเคยทำคดีก็มานั่งร่วมโต๊ะนี้

translation.en: ...you and I, like a couple of regular fellows.
